title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Mar 15 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Mar 15 2022
description:
Nationally syndicated radio talk show host Jesse Kelly joins Clay and Buck to let loose on the nuclear news cycle. Mask pressure in airports, schools. Psychiatrist Mark McDonald, M.D., author of "United States of Fear," on how America has suffered from two pandemics: a viral one and a psychological one. C&B wrap up the show talking about what masks and fear have done to kids and ask an important question about pronouns.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
